item.title: Guidance and Manufacturer Declaration - Electromagnetic Emissions
item.description: The NGENUITY™ system is intended for use in the electromagnetic environments specified below. The customer or the user of the*NGENUITY™ system should assure it is used in such an environment. Emissions Test Compliance Electromagnetic Environment - Guidance RF Emissions (CISPR 11) Group 1 The system uses RF energy only for its internal functions. Therefore, its RF emissions are low and are not likely to cause any interference in nearby electronic equipment.
